item.title: 特朗普威胁哥伦比亚后，美元因关税忧虑而上涨
item.description: 周一，美元走强，交易员们在美联储普遍预计将维持利率稳定的本周伊始思考美国总统唐纳德-特朗普关税计划的影响。【原文：The dollar firmed on Monday as traders pondered the ramifications of U.S. President Donald Trump's tariff plans at the start of a week where the Federal Reserve is widely expected to hold interest rates steady.】

item.title: 特朗普再次呼吁欧佩克降价，石油价格下滑
item.description: 美国总统特朗普在上任后的第一周就宣布了提高美国石油和天然气产量的广泛措施，并呼吁欧佩克降价，此后油价周一下跌超过1%。【原文：Oil prices fell more than 1% on Monday after U.S. President Trump called on OPEC to reduce prices following the announcement of wide-ranging measures to boost U.S. oil and gas output in his first week in office.】

item.title: JLR 将投资 8000 万美元以满足定制豪华车颜色的需求
item.description: 捷豹路虎（JLR）周一表示，将投资 6500 万英镑（8071 万美元）扩大其在英国和斯洛伐克的豪华车喷漆服务，以满足高端客户对个性化汽车日益增长的需求。【原文：Jaguar Land Rover (JLR) will invest 65 million pounds ($80.71 million) to expand its luxury paint services in the UK and Slovakia to meet increased demand for personalised cars from high-end clients, it said on Monday.】

item.title: 特朗普宣布对哥伦比亚商品征收关税后，墨西哥比索下跌
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普宣布将对哥伦比亚征收关税后，墨西哥比索在国际贸易中贬值，再次引发了人们对其贸易政策的担忧。【原文：The Mexican peso depreciated in international trade after U.S President Donald Trump announced he would impose tariffs on Colombia, reviving concerns about his trade policy.】

item.title: 美国 FDA 批准卫材/百健公司的阿尔茨海默氏症药物每月维持剂量
item.description: 美国食品和药物管理局周一表示，已批准日本卫材公司与合作伙伴百健公司的阿尔茨海默氏症药物Leqembi每月服用一次维持剂量。【原文：The U.S. Food and Drug Administration has approved monthly maintenance dosing for Japan's Eisai and partner Biogen's Alzheimer's drug Leqembi, the companies said on Monday.】

item.title: 据 CNBC 报道，Perplexity AI 修改了 Tiktok 合并方案，美国政府可能获得 50%的股份
item.description: 据 CNBC 周日报道，Perplexity AI 修订了其向 TikTok 母公司字节跳动提交的合并方案。【原文：Perplexity AI revised the merger proposal it had submitted to TikTok parent ByteDance, CNBC reported on Sunday.】

item.title: 早间竞价监测美元、DeepSeek 和中国采购经理人指数
item.description: 亚洲市场前瞻【原文：A look at the day ahead in Asian markets.】

item.title: 环球音乐集团与 Spotify 达成新协议
item.description: 全球最大的音乐厂牌环球音乐集团（UMG）和瑞典流媒体巨头 Spotify 周日表示，双方已就录制音乐和音乐出版达成一项新的多年协议。【原文：Universal Music Group (UMG) , the world's biggest music label, and Swedish streaming giant Spotify have reached a new multi-year agreement for recorded music and music publishing, they said on Sunday.】

item.title: 帝亚吉欧称无意出售健力士或酩悦轩尼诗股份
item.description: 世界顶级烈酒制造商帝亚吉欧集团周日表示，不打算出售其啤酒品牌健力士（Guinness）或在路威酩轩集团（LVMH）旗下饮料部门酩悦轩尼诗（Moet Hennessy）的股份。【原文：Diageo does not intend to sell its beer brand Guinness or its stake in Moet Hennessy, LVMH's drinks unit, the world's top spirits makers said on Sunday.】

item.title: 消息人士称，Mediobanca 董事会将于周二审议 MPS 的 133 亿欧元收购要约
item.description: Mediobanca 首席执行官阿尔贝托-纳格尔（Alberto Nagel）表示，尚未与该银行就 MPS 的报价达成一致。【原文：Mediobanca's Chief Executive Alberto Nagel said the MPS offer had not been agreed with the bank.】

item.title: 据美国全国公共广播电台报道，白宫正在就甲骨文和美国投资者接管 TikTok 事宜进行谈判
item.description: 据 NPR 报道，ByteDance 将保留公司的少数股份。【原文：ByteDance would retain a minority stake in the company, NPR reported.】

item.title: 谷歌推动全球议程，对工人和立法者进行人工智能教育
item.description: 谷歌已经面临着多方面的监管冲击。【原文：Google already faces a regulatory onslaught on many fronts.】

item.title: 特朗普访问拉斯维加斯讨论小费税问题
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）将于周六在拉斯维加斯停留，谈论削减小费税的问题，这是他 2024 年在拉斯维加斯这个赌博和酒店业中心做出的竞选承诺。【原文：President Donald Trump is capping a frenzied first week back in office with a stop in Las Vegas on Saturday to talk about cutting taxes on tips, a 2024 campaign promise he made in the gambling and hospitality hub.】

item.title: 我被审查了吗？一些美国 TikTok 用户称禁令解除后应用程序感觉不同了
item.description: 曾经视 TikTok 为言论自由天堂的美国 TikTok 用户说，在中国字节跳动公司拥有的 TikTok 平台因唐纳德-特朗普总统的行政命令而恢复后，他们看到了审查的迹象。【原文：U.S. TikTok users who once saw the app as a haven for free speech say they see signs of censorship after the platform, which is owned by China's ByteDance, was revived by an executive order from President Donald Trump.】

item.title: 美国国家公路交通安全管理局（NHTSA）称，起亚美国公司将召回 8 万多辆因线路损坏导致安全气囊展开不当的美国汽车
item.description: 美国国家公路交通安全管理局（U.S. National Highway Traffic Safety Administration）周六表示，起亚美国公司将在美国召回80,255辆Niro电动车、插电式混合动力车和混合动力车，因为安全气囊和安全带展开不当或安全气囊无意中展开会增加车祸中受伤的风险。【原文：Kia America is recalling 80,255 Niro EV, Plug-in Hybrid and Hybrid vehicles in the U.S. as air bags and seat belts that deploy improperly or an air bag deploying unintentionally can increase the risk of injury in a crash, the U.S. National Highway Traffic Safety Administration said on Saturday.】

item.title: 英国 WH Smith 称正在探索出售高街业务的可能性
item.description: 英国零售商 WH Smith 周六表示，正在为其高街业务探索潜在的战略选择，包括出售。【原文：British retailer WH Smith said on Saturday that it was exploring potential strategic options for its high street business, including a sale.】

item.title: 印度 Religare 公司称美国商人对其股份提出了竞争性收购要约
item.description: 印度 Religare 企业称，一名美国商人已提出收购该公司 26% 股份的建议，这是该金融服务公司控制权争夺战的最新转折。【原文：India's Religare Enterprises said a U.S. businessman has made a proposal to acquire a 26% stake in it, the latest twist in the battle for control of the financial services company which has rejected another bid as being priced too low.】

item.title: 独家报道联邦贸易委员会主席称 COVID 早已结束，请回到办公室
item.description: 联邦贸易委员会（Federal Trade Commission）主席周五承认，该机构约 80% 的员工每周大部分时间都在家工作，员工们对重返全职办公室感到焦虑，但他表示，COVID 大流行早已过去，员工们需要在办公桌前工作。【原文：The chairman of the Federal Trade Commission on Friday acknowledged staff anxiety over returning to full-time in the office at an agency where around 80% work from home most of the week, but said the COVID pandemic is long over and workers need to be at their desks.】

item.title: 据 TechCrunch 报道，联合健康确认有 1.9 亿美国人受到技术部门黑客攻击的影响
item.description: 据 TechCrunch 周五报道，UnitedHealth 技术部门 Change 遭到的网络攻击影响了 1.9 亿美国人的个人信息。【原文：The cyberattack at UnitedHealth's tech unit Change affected the personal information of 190 million Americans, TechCrunch reported on Friday.】

item.title: 辉瑞公司将为偏头痛药物回扣支付 5970 万美元
item.description: 美国司法部周五表示，辉瑞公司将支付 5970 万美元，以解决其收购的一家公司通过支付回扣让医生开具偏头痛药物 Nurtec ODT 来欺诈医疗保险和其他医疗项目的指控。【原文：Pfizer will pay $59.7 million to resolve charges that a company it acquired defrauded Medicare and other healthcare programs by paying kickbacks so doctors would prescribe the migraine drug Nurtec ODT, the U.S. Department of Justice said on Friday.】

item.title: Ben & Jerry's指责联合利华因特朗普而对其封口
item.description: 本-杰瑞（Ben & Jerry's）周五加大了对联合利华（Unilever）的审查诉讼力度，指控其母公司压制了这家美国冰淇淋制造商想要发布的一份社会政策声明，因为该声明提到了唐纳德-特朗普总统。【原文：Ben & Jerry's on Friday ratcheted up its censorship lawsuit against Unilever , accusing its parent company of suppressing a social policy statement the U.S. ice cream maker wanted to release because it mentioned President Donald Trump.】

item.title: 破产的普渡公司为推进价值 74 亿美元的阿片类药物交易赢得时间
item.description: 普渡制药公司（Purdue Pharma）周五表示，该公司需要更多的时间来为一项价值 74 亿美元的新和解方案争取支持，这项新和解方案可能会完成该公司多年来为解决数千起有关其成瘾性止痛药奥施康定（OxyContin）的诉讼所做的努力。【原文：Purdue Pharma said on Friday it needs more time to build support for a new $7.4 billion settlement that could complete the company's years-long effort to resolve thousands of lawsuits over its addictive pain medication OxyContin.】

item.title: 博雅计划就去银行化问题与白宫和国会接触 - 发言人
item.description: 美国银行发言人周五表示，该行将与唐纳德-特朗普总统的政府和国会就可能导致该行退出与客户的银行业务关系的法规进行接触。【原文：Bank of America will be engaging with President Donald Trump's administration and Congress on regulations that the bank said can lead to it exiting banking relationships with a customer, a spokesperson said on Friday.】

item.title: 特朗普政府要求最高法院在重新考虑政策时暂停审理案件
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）的政府周五要求美国最高法院搁置燃料生产商根据联邦空气污染法对加州汽车尾气排放和电动汽车标准提出质疑的辩论计划。【原文：President Donald Trump's administration asked the U.S. Supreme Court on Friday to put on hold planned arguments in a bid by fuel producers to challenge California's standards for vehicle emissions and electric cars under a federal air pollution law.】

item.title: 服役、在建和开发中的美国海上风电场
item.description: 1 月 20 日，美国总统唐纳德-特朗普重返椭圆形办公室的第一天就暂停了新的联邦海上风电租赁，以等待环境和经济审查。【原文：U.S. President Donald Trump suspended new federal offshore wind leasing on his first day back in the Oval Office on Jan. 20, pending an environmental and economic review.】

item.title: 华尔街日报》报道：华尔街银行将出售数十亿美元 X 贷款
item.description: 华尔街日报》周五援引知情人士的话报道称，华尔街银行正准备出售社交媒体平台 X 的大部分债务。【原文：Wall Street banks are preparing to sell a big portion of debt holdings in social media platform X, the Wall Street Journal reported on Friday, citing people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 美国放弃对 UnitedHealth 医疗保险计划评级案的上诉
item.description: 美国医疗保险与医疗补助服务中心周五表示，它不会对法院要求其重新计算对联合健康保险公司（UnitedHealth）私人管理的医疗保险计划的公开星级评定的命令提出上诉，该保险公司称，这将使其因失去客户而损失数百万美元。【原文：The U.S. Centers for Medicare and Medicaid Services on Friday said it would not appeal a court order that it recalculate the public star ratings it gave to UnitedHealth's privately administered Medicare health insurance plans, which the insurer said would cost it millions of dollars from lost customers.】

item.title: Meta 将在美国和日本测试 Threads 上的广告
item.description: Meta Platforms 周五表示，随着其社交媒体平台 Threads 的月活跃用户超过 3 亿，该公司将开始与美国和日本的一些品牌合作，测试在 Threads 上投放广告。【原文：Meta Platforms will begin test launching ads on its social media platform Threads with a few brands in the U.S. and Japan, it said on Friday, as the app hits over 300 million monthly active users.】

item.title: 美国联邦贸易委员会（FTC）主席弗格森赢得对特朗普 "DEI大清洗 "的首次投票
item.description: 美国联邦贸易委员会（Federal Trade Commission）主席安德鲁-弗格森（Andrew Ferguson）在委员会中仍占多数的民主党人下台后，获得了广泛的权力来清理该机构的多元化、公平和包容（DEI）政策。【原文：U.S. Federal Trade Commission Chair Andrew Ferguson gained broad authority to purge diversity, equity and inclusion (DEI) policies at the agency after Democrats, who still have the majority on the commission, stood down.】

item.title: 美国法官暂停太空探索技术公司（SpaceX）就反移民偏见案提出质疑
item.description: 一名联邦法官周五批准了美国司法部的请求，暂停埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）的太空探索技术公司（SpaceX）的诉讼，称司法部无权追究该太空技术公司拒绝雇用某些移民的指控。【原文：A federal judge on Friday granted the U.S. Department of Justice's request to pause a lawsuit by Elon Musk's SpaceX claiming the agency lacks the power to pursue claims that the space technology company refused to hire certain immigrants.】
